prompt: Can you recommend an extension that provides live translation with subtitles?

hidden_queries: browser extension live translation with subtitles live translation subtitles extension
Chrome extension for live translation with subtitles translation subtitles for meetings videos
metadata.generated_search_query: browser extension live translation with subtitles live translation subtitles extension

sources.title: Felo Subtitles: ChatGPT Live Translation - Microsoft Edge Addons
sources.snippet: Felo browser subtitles provide real-time translation, enhancing your web meetings and live streams with AI technology. Using the latest AI, it delivers the most accurate and reliable transcription & translation results.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are browser extensions that add live translation with subtitles for videos, live streams, meetings, and general audio content. Options vary by features, language support, and platform: Chrome Web Store+4microsoftedge.microsoft.com+4Chrome Web Store+4

sources.title: Live Translation: Real-Time Video & Audio Translator
sources.snippet: Overview AI-powered real-time translation tool for videos, live streams, and meetings, supporting 50+ languages. Break language barriers effortlessly with Tellus AI, your Chrome extension for instant video translation from any language into yours so that you can unlock the power of communication.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Good options: 1) Tellus / Live Translation (Chrome) • Adds live translated subtitles and spoken translations for videos, live streams, meetings, webinars, podcasts. • Supports 50+ languages and works across many web apps. Chrome Web Store

2) SonicCaption (Chrome) • Real-time bilingual subtitles (original + translation) for any tab. • Works with video/audio streams including YouTube, movies, online meetings, courses, podcasts. • 60+ languages, low latency. Chrome Web Store

sources.title: TranslateSub - Chrome Web Store
sources.snippet: Real-time audio & video transcription and translation with subtitles This extension automatically transcribes audio from web pages (including videos and live streams) into real-time subtitles while providing translations in 75 languages.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 3) TranslateSub (Chrome) • Auto live transcription + translation with subtitles. • Supports 75 languages. • Basic real-time captions for video and live streams. Chrome Web Store
4) ViiTor Translate (Chrome) • Real-time bilingual subtitles & translation for live audio, video pages, meetings. • Supports ~19 languages with built-in privacy-focused processing. Chrome Web Store

sources.title: Felo Subtitles: ChatGPT Live Translation - Microsoft Edge Addons
sources.snippet: Felo browser subtitles provide real-time translation, enhancing your web meetings and live streams with AI technology. Using the latest AI, it delivers the most accurate and reliable transcription & translation results.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 5) Felo Subtitles (Chrome/Edge) • Adds real-time translated captions for meetings (Google Meet) and live streams (YouTube, Twitch). • Supports a handful of major languages. microsoftedge.microsoft.com

sources.title: Live Translation: Real-Time Video & Audio Translator
sources.snippet: Overview AI-powered real-time translation tool for videos, live streams, and meetings, supporting 50+ languages. Break language barriers effortlessly with Tellus AI, your Chrome extension for instant video translation from any language into yours so that you can unlock the power of communication.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Notes / caveats to check before installing: Some extensions require an account or usage limits (minutes/hours). Chrome Web Store
